content.text: 异步写入数据到文件，根据需要创建目录。Asynchronously writes data to a file, creating directories as needed with automatic directory structure creation.
成功写入时解析为true的Promise。Promise that resolves to true on successful write
如果fileData为空或写入操作失败则拒绝。Rejects if fileData is empty or write operation fails

summary.text: 要写入的文件路径。The file path to write to

text.comment: 要写入的文件路径。The file path to write to

summary.text: 要写入文件的内容。The content to write to the file

text.comment: 要写入文件的内容。The content to write to the file

summary.text: 如果为true，覆盖现有文件；如果为false，追加到现有文件。If true, overwrites existing file; if false, appends to existing file

text.comment: 如果为true，覆盖现有文件；如果为false，追加到现有文件。If true, overwrites existing file; if false, appends to existing file

Function:

writeFile

Description:

异步写入数据到文件，根据需要创建目录。Asynchronously writes data to a file, creating directories as needed with automatic directory structure creation.

Returns:

成功写入时解析为true的Promise。Promise that resolves to true on successful write

Throws:

如果fileData为空或写入操作失败则拒绝。Rejects if fileData is empty or write operation fails

Example:
// Write a new file
await writeFile('./output.txt', 'Hello World');
console.log('File written successfully');
Example:
// Append to existing file
await writeFile('./log.txt', 'New log entry\n', false);
Example:
// Write with error handling
try {
  await writeFile('./config/settings.json', JSON.stringify(config));
  console.log('Configuration saved');
} catch (error) {
  console.error('Failed to save configuration:', error);
}
